text: Ezɨ dughiar kamɨn Josua akar gavgavim isa gumazamizibagh anɨga ghaze, “Gumazitam ua Jerikon nguibar kamɨn ingarightɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God, a gasɨghasigham. A ua nguibar kamɨn ingangaritam damightɨ a dɨkavightɨ, an otarir ivariam ovengam. Egh a nguibar kamɨn tiar akar ekiabar ingartɨ, an otarir abuananam ovengam.”
